name: OYA Femtech Apparel
description: OYA Femtech Apparel fights feminine health issues for athletes. Our apparel absorbs moisture, reduces bacteria, and increases natural ventilation. Our patent-pending leggings are the first to be designed with doctors to combat the $18B that US women spent last year dealing with feminine health issues (e.g., yeast infections, bacterial vaginosis, and urinary tract infections) because of athleisure, lack of knowledge, poor diet, etc.
one_liner: OYA Femtech Apparel fights feminine health issues for athletes. Our apparel absorbs moisture, reduces bacteria, and increases natural ventilation. Our patent-pending leggings are the first to be designed with doctors to combat the $18B that US women spent last year dealing with feminine health issues (e.g., yeast infections, bacterial vaginosis, and urinary tract infections) because of athleisure, lack of knowledge, poor diet, etc.
